bibl.title: Ruler Cults in Practice: Sacrifices and Libations for Arsinoe Philadelphos, from Alexandria and Beyond.
bibl.note: 1. Arsinoe's cults as a network. - 2. Detecting individual agency in the cults for Arsinoe. - 3. Interdiction concerning the sacriﬁce of goats. - 4. Bridging the gap between individual and collective: A reconsideration of the scene on Ptolemaic oinochoai. - Pp. 109-115: Appendix: A geographical catalogue of inscribed altars, stones, and vessels pertaining to the cult of Arsinoe Philadelphos. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: "Divinizzazione, culto del sovrano e apoteosi. Tra Antichità e Medioevo."
